text: Bigu ej Pajomʙar ʙa musrikoni qavmat: «Ba man xaʙar dihed, agar Qur'on az coniʙi Alloh ʙosad va sumo ʙa on imon naovared va jake az mardoni ʙani Isroil (misli Aʙdullo iʙni Salom) ʙa on guvohi dihad va imon ʙiovarad, vale sumo gardankasi karded, ojo sitamgar nested? Alʙatta, Alloh ta'olo mardumi sitamkorro ʙa sui Islom hidojat namekunad!»
